name: Meme Barley-Break
description:
Meme Barley-Break is simple puzzle game where you need to collect memes according to the rules of the Barley-Break. Collect Barley-Break with memes and pump your mind!

- 20 levels
- all sorts of options on each of them
- pleasant music
- addictive gameplay
- thematic achievements

As soon as possible:
- themed trading cards
- themed backgrounds
- themed emoticons
